Html:
This is posted too in Github

In my project I use EF and MEF all is working fine. But if I try to navigate with a button to a page in an other group the page is displayed in the current group.

I have tested with a new project template "Modern UI WPF Navigation Application".
  • In "MainWindow.xaml" add a link to a page (e.g. TabPage1.xaml)
  • Add content (Content1.xaml) to the TabPage1
  • In Content add a button with 
Command="mui:LinkCommands.NavigateLink" 
CommandParameter="/Pages/Settings/About.xaml"
if you click on the button the navigation displayed the "About" page in the default group instead in "settings" group.
